subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kolten Wong, 23, gains perspective from his mother’s death as he looks for a fresh start on the baseball field after ending his 2013 season on a game-ending pickoff in the World Series.
snippet: Kolten Wong, 23, gains perspective from his mother’s death as he looks for a fresh start on the baseball field after ending his 2013 season on a game-ending pickoff in the World Series.
